games.label: Cartography
games.goal: Generate a panorama of available subsidies by country, sector, and status.

games.label: Eligibility
games.goal: Test project eligibility against legal, fiscal, and administrative criteria.

games.label: Optimization
games.goal: Simulate maximizable amounts and compatible cumulations.

games.label: Application
games.goal: Turn raw project data into a compliant funding application structure.
games.output: Structured template + checklist of required documents.

games.label: Accelerator
games.goal: Model the administrative process and detect bottlenecks.

games.label: The Sphinx
games.goal: Mythological initiation game to estimate potential treasure and funding matrix.
games.output: 5-horizon matrix + treasure estimate (0–300k) + Sphinx score (0–100) + quest journal (D+14, D+30).
